metadata.title: CVE-2024-6389 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab-CE/EE affecting all versions startingwith 17.0 before 17.1.7, 17.2 before 17.2.5, and 17.3 before 17.3.2. Anattacker as a guest user was able to access commit information via therelease Atom endpoint, contrary to permissions.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
